DOC.brief_summary: To determine if increasing the amount of calcium that girls eat or the degree of exercise in which they participate will increase their bone strength.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Determine How Exercise and Calcium Affect Pubertal Bone
DOC.criteria: 910 years of age Premenarcheal Female corticosteroid or anticonvulsant therapy lactose intolerance or milk allergy family history of hypercholesterolemia mental or physical handicaps chronic disease body mass index Â³ 85th percentile for age and gender baseline calcium intake of > 1100 mg/day participation in team sports > 3 times per week
